Package edu.salle.url.maze.presentation

Interface MazeRenderer

public interface MazeRenderer
Interface abstracting the Maze rendering mechanisms from the end user (if you're reading this, that means you). Mostly for debugging purposes. Provides slightly different methods to show the Maze with a path via the system's UI.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    render(Cell[][] maze, List<Direction> solution)
    Generic method to render the Maze's input matrix and the proposed solution to the system's UI.
    void
    render(Cell[][] maze, List<Direction> solution, long sleep)
    More specific method that renders the Maze's input matrix and the proposed solution to the system's UI, and then waits for the specified number of milliseconds.

  • Method Details

    • render

      void render(Cell[][] maze, List<Direction> solution)
      Generic method to render the Maze's input matrix and the proposed solution to the system's UI.
      Parameters:
      maze - The Maze's input Cell matrix, which usually will be the one received in the solver.
      solution - The proposed solution for that input, as a list of Direction.

    • render

      void render(Cell[][] maze, List<Direction> solution, long sleep)
      More specific method that renders the Maze's input matrix and the proposed solution to the system's UI, and then waits for the specified number of milliseconds. It's provided mostly for debugging and academic purposes, as it's useful to visualize your algorithm's process step by step.
      Parameters:
      maze - The Maze's input Cell matrix, which usually will be the one received in the solver.
      solution - The proposed solution for that input, as a list of Direction.
      sleep - The number of milliseconds to wait for after rendering the proposed solution.
